title: Someone please read this :D
body: Heyy i just lost a ranked game because of teemo dying in lane 9 times and ashe running up to enemy team thinking shes a tank so i flamed at them as usual... Anyhow my account got banned for 14 days after this game which i won't say i didn't deserve but I'm not gonna say the people i flamed at didn't deserve it either.... I know I've done wrong but you have to understand i have 2 broken legs from playing rugby and i am just very frustrated at the moment.. I seriously have nothing to do but play league of legends.. Is there anyway you guys can just unban my account and mute me from talking instead? I know It's alot to ask but i really don't have anything else to do until my legs recover .. Okay thanks for reading :)

replies.body:
Hey there,

If you feel your ban was unjust or would like it reviewed you'll need to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support as they're the only ones who can assist with bans.

Reading your thread though, it sounds like you have a history of repetitively being toxic so I have my doubts as to whether the ban will be lifted.

> so i flamed at them as usual...
Does anybody know if there is anyway for me to get unbanned because I'm really bored now :/
